services.name: Fast Image Generation
services.description: Quick image generation using FLUX Schnell (~2s, good for drafts)

services.name: Quality Image Generation
services.description: High-quality image generation using FLUX.2 Pro (~5s, production-ready)

services.name: Text-in-Image Generation
services.description: Image generation with accurate text rendering using Ideogram v3 (best for logos, signage)

services.name: Code Execution
services.description: Run code in isolated sandbox — Python, JavaScript, Bash, R (up to 5 min)

services.name: Audio Transcription
services.description: Convert audio to text with speaker identification — covers up to 10 minutes of audio

services.name: Crypto Price Feed
services.description: Real-time cryptocurrency prices for any coin in any fiat currency

services.name: Crypto Market Data
services.description: Market rankings with price, volume, market cap — filterable by category

services.name: Crypto Historical Data
services.description: Historical price, market cap, and volume data for any coin

services.name: Trending Crypto
services.description: Currently trending coins on CoinGecko

services.name: Crypto Search
services.description: Search for a coin by name or symbol to get its CoinGecko ID

services.name: Wallet Balances
services.description: Token balances for any wallet across 20+ chains — EVM, Solana, Bitcoin

services.name: Wallet Transactions
services.description: Transaction history with asset transfers and labels for any wallet

services.name: Wallet P&L
services.description: Portfolio profit/loss with realized and unrealized P&L per token

services.name: Token Prices
services.description: Real-time DEX-derived token prices with OHLC data — up to 200 tokens per request

services.name: Token Metadata
services.description: Token/asset metadata — name, symbol, decimals, chain info

services.name: IPFS Pin
services.description: Pin JSON, files, or URLs to IPFS for decentralized storage

services.name: IPFS Retrieve
services.description: Fetch a file from IPFS by CID via gateway

services.name: Flight Search
services.description: Search flight offers by route, dates, and passengers — returns pricing, itineraries, and airlines

services.name: Airport & City Search
services.description: Autocomplete search for airports and cities by keyword — returns IATA codes, names, coordinates

services.name: Hotel Search
services.description: Search hotel offers by city code and dates — returns room details, pricing, and availability

services.name: Cheapest Travel Dates
services.description: Find the cheapest travel dates for a route — returns date/price pairs sorted by price

services.name: NFT Metadata
services.description: Get NFT name, description, image, traits, and collection info by chain, contract, and token ID

services.name: NFT Ownership
services.description: Get the current owner address of an NFT by chain, contract, and token ID

services.name: NFT Collection
services.description: Get collection name, description, stats, and floor price by chain and contract address

services.name: ENS Resolve
services.description: Resolve an ENS name (e.g. vitalik.eth) to an Ethereum address

services.name: ENS Reverse Lookup
services.description: Look up the ENS name for an Ethereum address (returns null if none set)

services.name: GPT-4o
services.description: OpenAI's flagship multimodal model — strong all-around for text, vision, and reasoning

services.name: GPT-4o Mini
services.description: Fast, affordable GPT-4o variant — great for simple tasks and high-volume use

services.description: OpenAI GPT-4.1 — improved coding, instruction following, and long context

services.name: GPT-4.1 Mini
services.description: Compact GPT-4.1 — fast and cost-effective with strong coding and instruction following

services.name: GPT-5
services.description: OpenAI's most capable model — best for complex reasoning, analysis, and generation

services.name: GPT-5 Mini
services.description: Compact GPT-5 — strong reasoning at lower cost, good for everyday tasks

services.name: OpenAI o3
services.description: OpenAI's reasoning model — excels at math, science, and multi-step problem solving

services.name: OpenAI o4 Mini
services.description: Fast reasoning model — strong at math and coding with lower latency than o3

services.name: Claude Opus 4.6
services.description: Anthropic's most powerful model — best for complex analysis, coding, and extended thinking

services.name: Claude Sonnet 4.5
services.description: Anthropic's balanced model — excellent coding, reasoning, and creative writing

services.name: Claude Haiku 4.5
services.description: Anthropic's fastest model — affordable and quick for simple tasks and high throughput

services.name: Gemini 2.5 Pro
services.description: Google's most capable model — strong at reasoning, coding, and multimodal tasks

services.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
services.description: Google's fast model — great balance of speed, quality, and cost for everyday tasks

services.name: DeepSeek V3
services.description: DeepSeek's flagship chat model — strong open-source reasoning and coding at low cost

services.name: DeepSeek R1
services.description: DeepSeek's reasoning model — chain-of-thought reasoning competitive with o3 at fraction of cost

services.name: Llama 3.3 70B
services.description: Meta's open-source model — great general-purpose performance at very low cost

services.name: Grok 4
services.description: xAI's most capable model — strong reasoning and real-time knowledge

services.name: Qwen3 235B
services.description: Alibaba's flagship open model — excellent multilingual and coding capabilities

services.name: Mistral Large 3
services.description: Mistral's flagship model — strong European AI with great multilingual support

services.name: Perplexity Sonar Pro
services.description: Search-augmented LLM — answers grounded in real-time web search with citations

services.name: Text Embeddings
